external_games.name: Sylvanian Families 3: Hoshifuru Yoru no Sunadokei
Sylvanian Families 3: Hoshifuru Yoru no Sunadokei

name: Sylvanian Families 3: Hoshifuru Yoru no Sunadokei
summary:
The third RPG in the Sylvanian Families series.

You play as a girl from the Striped Cat family, traveling through past and present with your forest friends to retrieve the shining stars that have disappeared from Sylvanian Village.
